en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We’re sorry, we can’t seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We’re sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We’re sorry, we’ve lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers.
en.TIMEOUT:
We’re sorry, we can’t seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: We’re sorry, the server has disconnected you. Please try again.
en.LOST_LICENSE: We’re sorry, we lost the license for this content!
en.STEAM_ERROR: We’re sorry, we couldn’t validate your Steam license.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: We’re sorry, we couldn’t validate your Twitch Prime license.
en.LOST_DLC: We’re sorry, the license for your DLC could not be found. Returning you to the menu…
en.BACK_TO_PACK_DESCRIPTION: Exit back to the Party Pack
en.CONNECTING_DELAY:
This is taking a while…
Please check your internet connection.
en.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: on your mobile device to join in
en.POST_GAME_CHOICE_TITLE: What do you want to do now?
en.VOLUME_HOST_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for the host(s).
en.VOLUME_SFX_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for sound effects.
en.VOLUME_MUSIC_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for the music.
en.AUDIENCE_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Turn ON to allow non-players to join and affect the game.
en.EXTENDED_TIMERS_DESCRIPTION: Extended timers will give you more time to make decisions.
en.PASSWORD_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Generate a password that players must enter to join the game.
en.TWITCH_REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: Require players to be logged into Twitch.
en.FAMILY_FRIENDLY_DESCRIPTION: Turn ON to avoid the most provocative content… from the game. We can’t control the players.
en.POSTGAME_SHARING_DESCRIPTION: Allow players to optionally share answers and scores from the game on social media.
en.MANUAL_CENSORING_DESCRIPTION: Allow the VIP (first player in) to censor players’ answers.
en.START_GAMEPAD_DESCRIPTION: Games must be started with controller, not from player devices.
en.HIDE_ROOM_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Allow the on-screen room code to be hidden.
en.MAX_PLAYERS_DESCRIPTION: Number of players that can join the game before people are added to the audience.
en.TUTORIAL_SKIP_CONTROLLER_TITLE: Press this button to skip the tutorial:
en.LOBBY_PICK_A_CATCHPHRASE_CONTROLLER_TITL: Select how to complete your catchphrase:
en.ROUND_WRITE_TOPIC_CONTROLLER_TITLE: Write as many topics as you can.
en.ROUND_WRITE_PUNCHLINE_CONTROLLER_DONE: Please wait for the other players…
en.ROUND_REVEAL_READ_YOUR_JOKE_CONTROLLER_T: Say your joke out loud if you want. Or don’t. We’re not the boss of you.
en.ROUND_REVEAL_AUTHOR_READY_CONTROLLER_TIT: It’s your turn. What do you want to do?
en.ROUND_REVEAL_AUTHOR_READY_CONTROLLER_BUT: (you will have more control over the timing.)
(use this if other players can’t hear you.)
en.ROUND_REVEAL_AUTHOR_LOOK_AT_TV_AND_READ: Look up at the SCREEN and read your joke!
en.ROUND_REVEAL_CENSOR_CONTROLLER_TITLE: Press this button to censor %s’s joke.
en.ROUND_REVEAL_CENSOR_CONTROLLER_BUTTON_HE: (press this if the joke is inappropriate)
en.ROUND_REVEAL_PERFORMER_PUNCHLINE_CONTROL: I’m ready to read my punchline!
en.ROUND_REVEAL_PERFORMER_CATCHPHRASE_CONTR: I’m ready to read my catchphrase!
en.ROUND_REVEAL_PERFORMER_PUNCHLINE_CONTROL: Press the button when you are ready to read your punchline.
en.ROUND_REVEAL_PERFORMER_CATCHPHRASE_CONTR: Press the button when you are ready to read your catchphrase.
en.ROUND_REVEAL_PERFORMER_CONTROLLER_CATCHP: Select if you want to show your catchphrase or not.
en.ROUND_REVEAL_VOTE_FOR_JOKE_CONTROLLER_DO: Please wait for the other players…
en.ROUND_REVEAL_VOTE_AUTHOR_CONTROLLER_WAIT: You wrote this, please wait for the other players to choose…
en.FINAL_ROUND_PICK_A_JOKE_CONTROLLER_TITLE: Pick the joke you want to compete against:
en.FINAL_ROUND_WRITE_PUNCHLINE_CONTROLLER_T: Write the punchline to this joke:
en.FINAL_ROUND_WRITE_PUNCHLINE_CONTROLLER_D: Please wait for the other players…
en.ERROR_CODE_ENTRY_TOO_LONG: Your entry was too long, please try again.
en.ERROR_CODE_ENTRY_DUPLICATED: Your entry was already submitted, please try another
